summary: Big Brother in Seattle? Washington legislators plan to plug secret algorithms directly into your brain, disguised as "transparency". Brace yourself for the AI overlords, citizens! 🍿🤖🔍

summary: The government's secretive "TermiGen" project is creating ultra-realistic simulations to train their A.I. minions. Is this the birth of Skynet, or just the dawn of robot butlers? Stay vigilant, truth-seekers!
